E

edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter
Base package of Application Starter app.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller
UI controller classes (Activity and Fragment subclasses) and any supporting nested classes.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.hilt - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.hilt
Dagger/Hilt modules that provide methods to satisfy dependencies which are not completely handled by Inject and other Hilt dependency-injection mechanisms.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.dao - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.dao
Data-access object (DAO) interfaces declaring CRUD operations on instances of the entity classes.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity
Entity classes mapped (using Room) to SQLite tables.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Repository and service classes providing access to device & external services, permissions & preferences, and the app's persistent data store.
edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel - package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel
ViewModel and AndroidViewModel subclasses maintaining cross-configuration-change state (and providing high-level asynchronous mutation operations on the app's mutable state, persistent or otherwise) for UI controllers.

Provides ReactiveX-integrated Google Sign In client flows for signing in, refreshing the bearer token, and signing out.

L

LocalDatabase - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
LocalDatabase.Callback - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
LocalDatabase.Converters - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just Instant) to one of those supported by Room/SQLite.
LoginActivity - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller
Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
LoginActivity() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller.LoginActivity
 
LoginViewModel - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current signed-in state and GoogleSignInAccount.

M

MainActivity - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller
Serves as a basic container activity—that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart from an options menu), but hosts a NavHostFragment for presentation of one or more Fragment instances, associated with a navigation graph.

P

PermissionsExplanationFragment - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller
Presents a modal dialog of rationales for permissions requested by this app.
PermissionsExplanationFragment() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller.PermissionsExplanationFragment
 
PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller
Declares the PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener.onAcknowledge(String[]) method to be implemented by the host activity (typically using a lambda), to resume the permissions flow after display of the permission rationales/explanations.
PermissionsRepository - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Implements a LiveData-based repository of permissions granted by the user, and handles the low-level details of the permissions flow.
PermissionsViewModel - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current permissions state—that is, to the set of permissions which have been granted by the user.
PreferencesRepository - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Implements a LiveData-based repository of preferences.
PreferencesViewModel - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to some subset of the current preferences state.

refreshBearerToken() - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service.GoogleSignInService

User - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity
Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based persistent data store.
User() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity.User
 
UserDao - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.dao
Provides CRUD operations on User entity instances.
UserRepository - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service
Provides high-level operations on a repository of User instances, backed by a SQLite database, in turn accessed via LocalDatabase.
UserViewModel - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the User entity instance corresponding to the current signed-in user, a user specified by its unique identifier (primary key value), and the full collection of users who have signed in to the app.
